name: BangkokPostThailandFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A flash briefing skill from Most Recent News RSS feed of Bangkok Post Thailand. Updated every hour.

You can call by use the following phases.
"Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?"
"Alexa, what's in the news?"

This skill was created by Prachya Suri (pecpys@gmail.com).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
